name: Baked Brie with Red Pepper Jelly
description: Transform an ordinary brie into a spectacular brie by covering it in red pepper jelly! Guaranteed to take you to your happy place.
preparation: Preheat oven to 350° F. Line 1⁄4 Sheet Pan with 1⁄4 Sheet Pan Liner.
Place brie on pan. Top with jelly. Bake 15 min or until soft.
Meanwhile, trim off the stems of dried figs and cut figs in quarters.
Transfer baked brie to serving dish and top with figs, pomegranate seeds, and pistachios.
tips: Serve with apple slices, pretzels, toasted baguette slices, or crackers.
To cook in the microwave, place brie in a 4-Cup Prep Bowl. Microwave uncovered for 60—90 sec. Invert onto a serving platter and top with Red Pepper Jelly and your favourite toppings.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: 1/4 Sheet Pan Liner (Set of 2)
summary: Easy to clean, nonstick, silicone mat with raised edges.

summary: Smaller size than a standard sheet pan for easy handling.
